keywords: Sustainability, Carbon Footprint, Batch Processing, Region Selection

question.t: 您的公司已承諾在 2030 年前實現碳中和目標。
question.en: Your company has committed to achieving carbon neutrality by 2030.

question.t: 您有一個大型的批次處理工作負載，對延遲不敏感，且可以在任何區域執行。
question.en: You have a large batch processing workload that is latency-insensitive and can run in any region.

question.t: 根據 Google Cloud 架構完善框架 (Well-Architected Framework) 的永續性支柱，您應該採取哪種策略來最小化碳足跡？
question.en: According to the Sustainability pillar of the Google Cloud Well-Architected Framework, which strategy should you adopt to minimize carbon footprint?

options.t: (A) 選擇 Google Cloud 控制台中標示為「低碳 (Low CO2)」的區域來部署工作負載。
options.en: (A) Choose regions marked as "Low CO2" in the Google Cloud Console to deploy workloads.

options.t: (B) 購買碳補償額度 (Carbon Offsets) 來抵銷使用量。
options.en: (B) Purchase Carbon Offsets to balance out usage.

options.t: (C) 使用 Spot VMs，因為它們比標準 VM 更節能。
options.en: (C) Use Spot VMs because they are more energy-efficient than standard VMs.

options.t: (D) 將所有工作負載遷移到 us-central1，因為那是最大的區域。
options.en: (D) Migrate all workloads to us-central1 as it is the largest region.

why.t: 根據永續性最佳實踐，選擇平均碳強度 (CFE) 較低的區域是減少雲端工作負載碳排放最直接且有效的方法。Google Cloud Console 會明確標示低碳區域。
why.en: According to sustainability best practices, selecting regions with lower Carbon Free Energy (CFE) scores is the most direct and effective way to reduce the carbon emissions of cloud workloads. The Google Cloud Console explicitly marks Low CO2 regions.

keywords: GenAI, Vertex AI Agent Builder, Tools, Function Calling

question.t: 您正在使用 Vertex AI Agent Builder 建立一個客戶服務聊天機器人。
question.en: You are building a customer service chatbot using Vertex AI Agent Builder.

question.t: 該機器人不僅需要回答常見問題，還需要能夠代表使用者在後端系統中「預約維修時間」。
question.en: The bot needs to not only answer FAQs but also "schedule repair appointments" in the backend system on behalf of the user.

question.t: 您已經有一個 REST API 可以執行預約動作。您應該如何在 Agent 中設定此功能？
question.en: You already have a REST API that can perform the booking action. How should you configure this functionality within the Agent?

options.t: (A) 在 System Instruction (Prompt) 中描述 API 的 URL 和參數格式。
options.en: (A) Describe the API URL and parameter format in the System Instruction (Prompt).

options.t: (B) 定義一個工具 (Tool)，並提供符合 OpenAPI 規範的 API 規格文件，讓 Agent 能夠呼叫。
options.en: (B) Define a Tool and provide an OpenAPI-compliant API specification document so the Agent can call it.

options.t: (C) 使用 Dialogflow CX 的 Webhook 功能。
options.en: (C) Use the Webhook feature of Dialogflow CX.

options.t: (D) 微調 (Fine-tune) 模型，使其學會如何產生 HTTP 請求程式碼。
options.en: (D) Fine-tune the model to learn how to generate HTTP request code.

why.t: Vertex AI Agents 透過「工具 (Tools)」來與外部系統互動。透過提供 OpenAPI 規範，Agent 可以理解 API 的結構，並利用 Function Calling 能力準確地生成呼叫 API 所需的參數。
why.en: Vertex AI Agents interact with external systems via "Tools". By providing an OpenAPI specification, the Agent can understand the API structure and use Function Calling capabilities to accurately generate the parameters needed to call the API.

keywords: Networking, NCC, Multi-cloud, Hub-and-Spoke

question.t: 您的企業在 Google Cloud、AWS 和 Azure 以及多個本地資料中心都有業務。
question.en: Your enterprise has operations across Google Cloud, AWS, Azure, and multiple on-premises data centers.

question.t: 您希望使用 Google Cloud 的全球骨幹網路作為樞紐 (Hub)，實現所有站點之間的全網狀 (Full-mesh) 連接。
question.en: You want to use Google Cloud's global backbone network as a Hub to enable full-mesh connectivity between all sites.

question.t: 您應該使用哪項服務來簡化這種多點對多點的連接管理？
question.en: Which service should you use to simplify the management of this many-to-many connectivity?

options.t: (A) Network Connectivity Center (NCC)。
(B) 多個 Cloud VPN 閘道搭配 Cloud Router 的 BGP 交換。
options.en: (B) Multiple Cloud VPN gateways with Cloud Router BGP exchange.

options.t: (C) VPC Network Peering。
(D) Private Service Connect。

why.t: Network Connectivity Center (NCC) 採用 Hub-and-Spoke 模型，允許將各種連接資源（如 VPN、Interconnect、Router Appliance）連接到一個中心 Hub。它利用 Google 的全球網路自動實現各個 Spoke 之間的傳遞路由 (Transitive Routing)，非常適合多雲和混合雲的全網狀連接。
why.en: Network Connectivity Center (NCC) uses a Hub-and-Spoke model, allowing various connectivity resources (VPN, Interconnect, Router Appliance) to be attached to a central Hub. It leverages Google's global network to automatically enable Transitive Routing between Spokes, making it ideal for multi-cloud and hybrid full-mesh connectivity.

keywords: Migration, Assessment, TCO, Migration Center

question.t: 財務長 (CFO) 要求您提供將本地資料中心遷移到 Google Cloud 的總體擁有成本 (TCO) 報告。
question.en: The CFO asks you to provide a Total Cost of Ownership (TCO) report for migrating the on-premises data center to Google Cloud.

question.t: 您不知道現有伺服器的具體規格和利用率，且時間緊迫。
question.en: You do not know the specific specifications and utilization of existing servers, and time is tight.

question.t: 您應該使用哪個工具來快速掃描基礎架構並產生 TCO 評估？
question.en: Which tool should you use to quickly scan the infrastructure and generate a TCO assessment?

options.t: (A) Migration Center 及其探索客戶端 (Discovery Client)。
options.en: (A) Migration Center and its Discovery Client.

options.t: (B) Google Cloud Pricing Calculator。
(C) 手動匯出 vCenter 清單並使用 Excel 計算。
options.en: (C) Manually export vCenter inventory and calculate using Excel.

options.t: (D) 安裝 Cloud Monitoring Agent。

why.t: Migration Center 是 Google Cloud 的統一遷移平台。透過部署 Discovery Client，它可以自動掃描本地環境，收集資產清單和效能數據，並直接產生詳細的 TCO 報告和調整大小建議，比手動計算更準確且快速。
why.en: Migration Center is Google Cloud's unified migration platform. By deploying the Discovery Client, it automatically scans the on-premises environment, collects asset inventory and performance data, and directly generates detailed TCO reports and rightsizing recommendations, which is faster and more accurate than manual calculation.

keywords: Compliance, Assured Workloads, Sovereignty, KAJ

question.t: 您的客戶是歐盟的一家政府機構，要求其雲端工作負載必須符合嚴格的數位主權 (Digital Sovereignty) 要求。
question.en: Your client is a government agency in the EU, requiring their cloud workloads to meet strict Digital Sovereignty requirements.

question.t: 這包括數據駐留、運維主權（Google 人員未經授權不得存取），以及加密金鑰的外部控制。
question.en: This includes data residency, operational sovereignty (no unauthorized access by Google personnel), and external control of encryption keys.

question.t: 您應該在建立專案時選擇哪種配置？
question.en: Which configuration should you choose when creating the project?

options.t: (A) 使用 Assured Workloads 並選擇「歐盟區域與主權控制 (EU Regions and Sovereign Controls)」合規性套件。
options.en: (A) Use Assured Workloads and select the "EU Regions and Sovereign Controls" compliance package.

options.t: (B) 僅選擇 europe-west3 區域，並使用預設加密。
options.en: (B) Select only the europe-west3 region and use default encryption.

options.t: (C) 使用 Cloud EKM 但不使用 Assured Workloads。
options.en: (C) Use Cloud EKM but without Assured Workloads.

options.t: (D) 使用 VPC Service Controls 隔離所有資源。
options.en: (D) Use VPC Service Controls to isolate all resources.

why.t: Assured Workloads 提供了一鍵式的合規環境設定。「歐盟主權控制」套件整合了數據駐留限制、Key Access Justifications (KAJ) 以及對 Google 支援人員存取的控制，是滿足全面數位主權需求的標準解決方案。
why.en: Assured Workloads provides one-click compliant environment setup. The "EU Sovereign Controls" package integrates data residency restrictions, Key Access Justifications (KAJ), and controls over Google support personnel access, making it the standard solution for meeting comprehensive digital sovereignty needs.

keywords: Storage, Parallelstore, AI/ML, HPC

question.t: 您的 AI 研究團隊正在訓練一個超大型的生成式 AI 模型，需要數千個 GPU 同時讀取訓練數據。
question.en: Your AI research team is training a massive generative AI model, requiring thousands of GPUs to read training data simultaneously.

question.t: 為了避免 GPU 閒置，儲存系統必須提供極高的吞吐量 (Throughput) 和亞毫秒級的延遲，且能夠處理小檔案的隨機讀取。
question.en: To avoid GPU idling, the storage system must provide extremely high throughput and sub-millisecond latency, and handle random reads of small files.

question.t: 標準的 Filestore 已經成為瓶頸。您應該推薦哪種 Google Cloud 儲存服務？
question.en: Standard Filestore has become a bottleneck. Which Google Cloud storage service should you recommend?

options.t: (A) Parallelstore。
(B) Cloud Storage FUSE。
(C) Filestore Enterprise。
(D) Persistent Disk Extreme。

why.t: Parallelstore 是基於 Intel DAOS 技術的全託管平行檔案系統，專為高效能運算 (HPC) 和 AI/ML 訓練設計。它消除了傳統 NFS (如 Filestore) 的元數據瓶頸，能提供比 Cloud Storage FUSE 更高的效能，特別是在大規模並行存取場景下。
why.en: Parallelstore is a fully managed parallel file system based on Intel DAOS technology, designed for HPC and AI/ML training. It eliminates metadata bottlenecks of traditional NFS (like Filestore) and provides higher performance than Cloud Storage FUSE, especially in massive parallel access scenarios.

keywords: Security, Supply Chain, Assured OSS, Software Delivery Shield

question.t: 開發團隊大量使用開源軟體 (OSS) 套件 (如 Java, Python) 進行開發。
question.en: The development team heavily uses Open Source Software (OSS) packages (e.g., Java, Python) for development.

question.t: 最近發生了多起因依賴項包含惡意程式碼而導致的安全事件。您希望確保團隊僅使用經過 Google 審查和測試的開源套件。
question.en: Recently, there have been several security incidents caused by dependencies containing malicious code. You want to ensure the team only uses OSS packages vetted and tested by Google.

question.t: 您應該將哪個組件整合到您的軟體供應鏈中？
question.en: Which component should you integrate into your software supply chain?

options.t: (A) Assured Open Source Software (Assured OSS)。
(B) Artifact Registry 遠端儲存庫 (Remote Repositories)。
(C) Cloud Build 漏洞掃描。
(D) Binary Authorization。

why.t: Assured OSS 提供了一組由 Google 建立、測試並定期掃描漏洞的可信賴開源套件。使用這些套件可以大幅降低供應鏈攻擊的風險，確保依賴項的安全性。
why.en: Assured OSS provides a set of trusted open-source packages that are built, tested, and regularly scanned for vulnerabilities by Google. Using these packages significantly reduces the risk of supply chain attacks and ensures dependency security.

keywords: Observability, Trace, Sampling, Cost

question.t: 您的微服務架構每天處理數十億次請求。您使用 Cloud Trace 來分析延遲問題。
question.en: Your microservices architecture processes billions of requests daily. You use Cloud Trace to analyze latency issues.

question.t: 然而，擷取所有請求的追蹤數據 (Trace Data) 會導致極高的成本。您只關心那些回應時間異常長 (尾部延遲) 的請求。
question.en: However, capturing Trace Data for all requests results in excessively high costs. You only care about requests with abnormally long response times (tail latency).

question.t: 您應該在應用程式中實作哪種採樣策略？
question.en: Which sampling strategy should you implement in your application?

options.t: (A) 尾部採樣 (Tail Sampling)。
(B) 標頭採樣 (Head Sampling) 並設定低採樣率。
options.en: (B) Head Sampling with a low sampling rate.

options.t: (C) 強制採樣 (Force Sampling) 所有錯誤請求。
options.en: (C) Force Sampling for all error requests.

options.t: (D) 停用 Trace，改用 Logging。
options.en: (D) Disable Trace and use Logging instead.

why.t: 標頭採樣 (Head Sampling) 是在請求開始時隨機決定是否記錄，容易錯過偶發的慢速請求。尾部採樣 (Tail Sampling) 則是在請求完成後，根據結果（例如延遲超過 1 秒或發生錯誤）決定是否保留追蹤數據，這能以較低成本精確捕捉到效能問題。
why.en: Head Sampling randomly decides whether to record at the start of a request, easily missing sporadic slow requests. Tail Sampling decides whether to keep the trace data after the request completes based on the outcome (e.g., latency > 1s or error occurred), effectively capturing performance issues at a lower cost.

keywords: FinOps, GKE, Cost Allocation, Multi-tenancy

question.t: 您的組織在一個共享的 GKE 叢集中運行多個團隊的工作負載 (多租戶)。
question.en: Your organization runs workloads from multiple teams in a shared GKE cluster (multi-tenancy).

question.t: 財務部門收到單一的 GKE 帳單，無法區分每個團隊具體消耗了多少成本。
question.en: The finance department receives a single GKE bill and cannot distinguish how much cost each team specifically consumed.

question.t: 每個團隊的 Pod 都位於獨立的 Namespace 並標有 `team: <name>` 的標籤。您應該啟用哪項功能來實現成本分攤 (Chargeback)？
question.en: Each team's Pods reside in separate Namespaces and are labeled `team: <name>`. Which feature should you enable to implement Chargeback?

options.t: (A) GKE 成本分配 (Cost Allocation) 與 GKE 使用量計量 (Usage Metering)。
options.en: (A) GKE Cost Allocation and GKE Usage Metering.

options.t: (B) 為每個團隊建立單獨的 Node Pool 並使用帳單標籤。
options.en: (B) Create separate Node Pools for each team and use billing labels.

options.t: (C) 使用 Resource Quotas 限制每個 Namespace 的 CPU 使用量。
options.en: (C) Use Resource Quotas to limit CPU usage per Namespace.

options.t: (D) 將帳單匯出到 BigQuery 並根據 Pod IP 進行分析。
options.en: (D) Export billing to BigQuery and analyze based on Pod IPs.

why.t: GKE 成本分配功能可以根據 Kubernetes 的概念 (如 Namespace, Label) 來細分叢集成本。啟用後，這些資訊會顯示在 Cloud Billing 報告中，讓財務部門能夠精確地將成本歸屬到各個團隊。
why.en: GKE Cost Allocation allows breaking down cluster costs by Kubernetes concepts (like Namespace, Label). Once enabled, this information appears in Cloud Billing reports, enabling the finance department to accurately attribute costs to each team.

keywords: GenAI, Search, RAG, Hybrid Search

question.t: 您構建了一個 RAG (檢索增強生成) 應用程式，使用 Vertex AI Vector Search 來檢索企業文件。
question.en: You have built a RAG application using Vertex AI Vector Search to retrieve enterprise documents.

question.t: 使用者回饋說，當他們搜尋特定的產品型號 (如 "Part-12345") 時，向量搜尋的結果往往不準確，因為語意搜尋對精確關鍵字匹配的表現不如預期。
question.en: Users report that when searching for specific product model numbers (e.g., "Part-12345"), vector search results are often inaccurate because semantic search performs poorly on exact keyword matching.

question.t: 您應該如何優化搜尋策略以同時滿足語意理解和精確匹配的需求？
question.en: How should you optimize the search strategy to satisfy both semantic understanding and exact matching requirements?

options.t: (A) 實作混合搜尋 (Hybrid Search)。
(B) 增加 Embedding 模型的維度。
options.en: (B) Increase the dimensions of the Embedding model.

options.t: (C) 僅使用 BigQuery 的文字搜尋。
(D) 增加 LLM 的 Temperature 參數。
options.en: (D) Increase the Temperature parameter of the LLM.

why.t: 混合搜尋結合了「向量搜尋 (語意)」和「關鍵字搜尋 (精確匹配)」的優點。對於特定型號或專有名詞，關鍵字搜尋更準確；對於概念性問題，向量搜尋更好。混合搜尋能將兩者的結果重新排序 (Reranking) 以提供最佳答案。
why.en: Hybrid Search combines the strengths of "Vector Search (Semantic)" and "Keyword Search (Exact Matching)". Keyword search is more accurate for specific model numbers or proper nouns, while vector search is better for conceptual queries. Hybrid Search reranks results from both to provide the best answer.

keywords: Networking, Cross-Cloud Interconnect, Multi-cloud, High Availability

question.t: 您的企業在 AWS 和 Google Cloud 上都有關鍵任務工作負載。
question.en: Your enterprise has mission-critical workloads on both AWS and Google Cloud.

question.t: 您需要這兩個雲端環境之間擁有高頻寬、低延遲且具備 99.99% SLA 的專用連接。
question.en: You need a dedicated high-bandwidth, low-latency connection with a 99.99% SLA between these two cloud environments.

question.t: 您希望避免管理複雜的中間服務供應商合約。您應該選擇哪種連接解決方案？
question.en: You want to avoid managing complex contracts with intermediate service providers. Which connectivity solution should you choose?

options.t: (A) 跨雲互連 (Cross-Cloud Interconnect)。
(B) 透過網際網路建立多條 Cloud VPN 通道。
options.en: (B) Establish multiple Cloud VPN tunnels over the internet.

options.t: (C) 使用 Partner Interconnect。
(D) 在兩個雲端之間設定 VPC Peering。
options.en: (D) Configure VPC Peering between the two clouds.

why.t: Cross-Cloud Interconnect 是一項託管服務，提供 Google Cloud 與其他主要雲端供應商（如 AWS, Azure）之間的專用實體連接。它提供高頻寬和 SLA，且由 Google 直接管理，無需與第三方電信業者簽約，這比 Partner Interconnect 更簡化，且比 VPN 更穩定。
why.en: Cross-Cloud Interconnect is a managed service providing dedicated physical connectivity between Google Cloud and other major cloud providers (like AWS, Azure). It offers high bandwidth and SLA, and is managed directly by Google without needing contracts with third-party carriers, making it simpler than Partner Interconnect and more stable than VPN.

keywords: Observability, Ops Agent, Compute Engine, Metrics

question.t: 您的維運團隊需要監控 Compute Engine 實例的記憶體使用率和磁碟空間使用率。
question.en: Your operations team needs to monitor memory usage and disk space usage of Compute Engine instances.

question.t: 他們查看 Cloud Monitoring 指標時，發現這些數據預設是缺失的。
question.en: When checking Cloud Monitoring metrics, they found that this data is missing by default.

question.t: 您應該採取什麼行動來收集這些指標？
question.en: What action should you take to collect these metrics?

options.t: (A) 在 VM 上安裝並設定 Ops Agent。
options.en: (A) Install and configure the Ops Agent on the VMs.

options.t: (B) 啟用 VPC Flow Logs。
(C) 升級 VM 的機器類型。
(D) 在 Cloud Console 中啟用「詳細監控 (Detailed Monitoring)」。
options.en: (D) Enable "Detailed Monitoring" in the Cloud Console.

why.t: Compute Engine 的預設監控僅基於 Hypervisor 層級，只能看到 CPU、網路和磁碟 I/O，無法看見作業系統內部 (Guest OS) 的記憶體或磁碟剩餘空間。必須安裝 Ops Agent 才能收集這些系統層級的指標。
why.en: Compute Engine default monitoring is based on the Hypervisor level, seeing only CPU, Network, and Disk I/O, but not Guest OS internals like memory or remaining disk space. The Ops Agent must be installed to collect these system-level metrics.

keywords: GenAI, Safety Filters, Vertex AI, Responsible AI

question.t: 您的公司正在開發一個面向公眾的生成式 AI 聊天機器人。
question.en: Your company is developing a public-facing generative AI chatbot.

question.t: 您擔心模型可能會產生仇恨言論或暴力內容，這將損害品牌形象。
question.en: You are concerned that the model might generate hate speech or violent content, which would damage the brand image.

question.t: 您應該在 Vertex AI Studio 中調整什麼設定來降低此風險？
question.en: What setting should you adjust in Vertex AI Studio to mitigate this risk?

options.t: (A) 調整安全設定 (Safety Settings) 閾值，以封鎖中等到高可能性的有害類別。
options.en: (A) Adjust Safety Settings thresholds to block medium to high probability harmful categories.

options.t: (B) 降低 Temperature 參數至 0。
(C) 增加 Top-K 和 Top-P 參數。
(D) 使用較小的模型版本 (如 Gemini Nano)。
options.en: (D) Use a smaller model version (like Gemini Nano).

why.t: Vertex AI 提供了內建的安全過濾器，允許開發者針對仇恨言論、性內容、騷擾和危險內容設定封鎖閾值 (Blocking Thresholds)。這是實作負責任 AI (Responsible AI) 的關鍵步驟。
why.en: Vertex AI provides built-in safety filters that allow developers to set Blocking Thresholds for Hate Speech, Sexually Explicit, Harassment, and Dangerous Content. This is a critical step in implementing Responsible AI.

keywords: Storage, Cost Optimization, Autoclass, Management

question.t: 您的部門管理著數百個 Cloud Storage Buckets，包含各種類型的檔案。
question.en: Your department manages hundreds of Cloud Storage Buckets containing various types of files.

question.t: 這些檔案的存取模式非常難以預測：有些可能數月不被存取，然後突然頻繁讀取，之後又變冷。
question.en: Access patterns for these files are highly unpredictable: some might not be accessed for months, then suddenly read frequently, and then go cold again.

question.t: 您希望在不產生額外管理開銷 (如撰寫複雜的生命週期規則) 的情況下優化儲存成本。您應該啟用哪個功能？
question.en: You want to optimize storage costs without incurring extra management overhead (like writing complex lifecycle rules). Which feature should you enable?

options.t: (A) 啟用 Autoclass。
(B) 設定 Nearline 作為預設儲存類別。
options.en: (B) Set Nearline as the default storage class.

options.t: (C) 設定物件生命週期管理 (OLM) 將 30 天未存取的物件轉為 Coldline。
options.en: (C) Configure Object Lifecycle Management (OLM) to move objects not accessed in 30 days to Coldline.

options.t: (D) 使用 Storage Transfer Service 定期備份。
options.en: (D) Use Storage Transfer Service for periodic backups.

why.t: Autoclass 會根據每個物件的實際存取模式，自動將其在 Standard、Nearline、Archive 等類別間移動。對於存取模式「無法預測」且需要「零管理」的場景，Autoclass 是最佳選擇，雖然它有管理費，但避免了手動規則可能導致的錯誤分類或取回費用。
why.en: Autoclass automatically moves objects between Standard, Nearline, Archive, etc., based on their actual access patterns. For scenarios where access patterns are "unpredictable" and "zero management" is desired, Autoclass is the best choice. Although it incurs a management fee, it avoids misclassification or retrieval fees that might result from manual rules.

keywords: Security, IAM, Workload Identity Federation, CI/CD, GitHub

question.en: Your development team uses GitHub Actions for CI/CD deployments.

question.t: 目前的流程需要將 Google Service Account Key (JSON) 儲存為 GitHub Secrets，這存在金鑰洩漏的風險。
question.en: The current process requires storing Google Service Account Keys (JSON) as GitHub Secrets, which poses a risk of key leakage.

question.t: 您希望消除長期憑證 (Long-lived Credentials)。您應該如何設定驗證？
question.en: You want to eliminate Long-lived Credentials. How should you configure authentication?

options.t: (A) 設定 Workload Identity Federation，信任 GitHub 作為 OIDC 身分提供者。
options.en: (A) Configure Workload Identity Federation to trust GitHub as an OIDC Identity Provider.

options.t: (B) 使用 Cloud Build 替代 GitHub Actions。
options.en: (B) Use Cloud Build instead of GitHub Actions.

options.t: (C) 每 24 小時手動輪替一次服務帳號金鑰。
options.en: (C) Manually rotate Service Account Keys every 24 hours.

options.t: (D) 使用 Compute Engine 預設服務帳號。
options.en: (D) Use the Compute Engine default Service Account.

why.en: Workload Identity Federation allows GitHub Actions to use its own OIDC tokens to exchange for short-lived Google Cloud access tokens. This completely eliminates the need to store and manage static JSON keys, making it the security best practice for external CI/CD integration.

keywords: Data Analytics, BigQuery, Gemini, SQL Generation

question.en: A business analyst needs to query marketing data in BigQuery but is not familiar with complex SQL syntax.

question.en: He wants to be able to describe the question in natural language (e.g., "Show total revenue by product category last month") and automatically get executable SQL.

keywords: Database, Spanner, High Availability, SLA, Architecture

why.en: Application Integration is Google Cloud's iPaaS (Integration Platform as a Service) solution. It offers a drag-and-drop visual designer and pre-built Connectors to connect SaaS applications like Salesforce and ServiceNow, perfectly meeting the low-code requirement.

question.en: They are on a very tight timeline and want to retain existing VMware management tools (vCenter, NSX) and operational processes without refactoring applications.

why.en: Google Cloud VMware Engine (GCVE) provides a fully managed VMware stack (including vSphere, vCenter, vSAN, NSX). This allows customers to perform a "Lift and Shift" migration, completely retaining existing tools and processes, making it the fastest and lowest-risk option.

why.en: API Gateway is a fully managed service designed for serverless workloads (like Cloud Functions, Cloud Run). It natively supports Firebase Authentication integration and allows easy definition of quotas and rate limits via API config, making it more suitable for serverless architectures than Cloud Endpoints (which requires deploying ESP containers).

keywords: Data Analytics, BigQuery, Optimization, Partitioning

question.t: 您的 BigQuery 資料表儲存了過去 5 年的物聯網 (IoT) 感測器數據，資料量達數 PB。
question.en: Your BigQuery table stores IoT sensor data for the past 5 years, amounting to petabytes.

question.t: 分析師通常只查詢最近 7 天的數據，且總是會根據 `sensor_id` 進行篩選。
question.en: Analysts typically query only the last 7 days of data and always filter by `sensor_id`.

question.t: 目前的查詢成本過高且速度緩慢。您應該如何優化資料表結構？
question.en: Current queries are too expensive and slow. How should you optimize the table structure?

options.t: (A) 根據 `timestamp` 進行分區 (Partitioning)，並根據 `sensor_id` 進行叢集 (Clustering)。
(B) 僅根據 `sensor_id` 進行分區。
(C) 為 `sensor_id` 建立物化視圖 (Materialized View)。
(D) 將舊資料移動到 Cloud Storage 並使用外部資料表查詢。
options.en: (D) Move old data to Cloud Storage and query using external tables.

why.t: 分區 (Partitioning) 能讓 BigQuery 僅掃描特定時間範圍的資料 (修剪無關分區)，大幅降低成本。叢集 (Clustering) 則會將相同 `sensor_id` 的資料物理上存放在一起，進一步加速針對該欄位的篩選查詢。兩者結合是最佳實踐。
why.en: Partitioning allows BigQuery to scan only data within a specific time range (pruning irrelevant partitions), drastically reducing costs. Clustering physically stores data with the same `sensor_id` together, further accelerating filtering queries on that column. Combining both is the best practice.

keywords: SRE, Reliability, Load Balancing, Circuit Breaking

question.t: 您的微服務架構中，服務 A 呼叫服務 B。當服務 B 出現高延遲或錯誤時，服務 A 的執行緒會被阻塞，最終導致服務 A 也崩潰 (連鎖故障)。
question.en: In your microservices architecture, Service A calls Service B. When Service B experiences high latency or errors, Service A's threads get blocked, eventually causing Service A to crash as well (Cascading Failure).

question.t: 您希望在服務 B 不健康時，快速失敗 (Fail Fast) 以保護服務 A。您應該實作哪種模式？
question.en: You want to Fail Fast to protect Service A when Service B is unhealthy. Which pattern should you implement?

options.t: (A) 熔斷器 (Circuit Breaking)。
(B) 指數退避 (Exponential Backoff)。
(C) 負載卸除 (Load Shedding)。
(D) 藍綠部署。

why.t: 熔斷器模式會監控下游服務的錯誤率。當錯誤超過閾值時，熔斷器會「跳脫 (Trip)」，立即使後續請求失敗 (Fail Fast)，而不再嘗試呼叫故障的服務 B，從而釋放服務 A 的資源並防止連鎖故障。指數退避適用於暫時性錯誤的重試，但在持續故障下可能會加重負擔。
why.en: The Circuit Breaking pattern monitors downstream error rates. When errors exceed a threshold, the circuit "trips," causing subsequent requests to fail immediately (Fail Fast) without attempting to call the faulty Service B, thereby freeing up Service A's resources and preventing cascading failure. Exponential Backoff is for retrying transient errors but can exacerbate load during persistent failures.

keywords: Compute Engine, OS Login, Security, Access Control

question.t: 您管理著大量的 Linux VM，並且需要控制哪些員工可以透過 SSH 登入哪些 VM，以及他們是否擁有 sudo 權限。
question.en: You manage a large fleet of Linux VMs and need to control which employees can SSH into which VMs and whether they have sudo privileges.

question.t: 管理 SSH 金鑰變得非常繁瑣且不安全。您應該啟用哪項功能來利用 Cloud IAM 管理 SSH 存取？
question.en: Managing SSH keys has become cumbersome and insecure. Which feature should you enable to use Cloud IAM for managing SSH access?

options.t: (A) OS Login。
(B) 在 Metadata 中手動新增 SSH 金鑰。
options.en: (B) Manually add SSH keys in Metadata.

options.t: (C) 使用啟動腳本 (Startup Script) 建立使用者。
options.en: (C) Use Startup Scripts to create users.

options.t: (D) 使用 Identity-Aware Proxy (IAP) 但不啟用 OS Login。
options.en: (D) Use Identity-Aware Proxy (IAP) without enabling OS Login.

why.t: OS Login 將 SSH 使用者帳戶與 Google 身分連結。這允許您使用 IAM 角色 (如 `roles/compute.osLogin` 和 `roles/compute.osAdminLogin`) 來精細控制誰可以登入以及誰有 sudo 權限，完全無需手動管理 SSH 金鑰。
why.en: OS Login links SSH user accounts with Google identities. This allows you to use IAM roles (like `roles/compute.osLogin` and `roles/compute.osAdminLogin`) to granularly control who can log in and who has sudo privileges, eliminating the need for manual SSH key management.

keywords: Case Study, Cymbal Retail, Cloud Spanner, Migration, Schema

question.t: 參考 Cymbal Retail 個案研究。Cymbal Retail 計畫將其庫存管理系統從傳統的關聯式資料庫遷移到 Cloud Spanner。
question.en: Refer to the Cymbal Retail case study. Cymbal Retail plans to migrate its inventory management system from a traditional relational database to Cloud Spanner.

question.t: 在傳統資料庫中，他們廣泛使用了外鍵 (Foreign Keys) 和長交易 (Long-running Transactions)。
question.en: In the traditional database, they extensively used Foreign Keys and Long-running Transactions.

question.t: 為了獲得最佳效能，您應該建議他們在 Spanner 中如何設計 Schema？
question.en: To achieve optimal performance, how should you recommend they design the Schema in Spanner?

options.t: (A) 使用交錯資料表 (Interleaved Tables) 來優化父子關係資料的查詢。
options.en: (A) Use Interleaved Tables to optimize queries for parent-child relationship data.

options.t: (B) 盡量避免使用主鍵 (Primary Key) 以減少寫入熱點。
options.en: (B) Avoid using Primary Keys as much as possible to reduce write hotspots.

options.t: (C) 將所有資料正規化 (Normalization) 到極致。
options.en: (C) Normalize all data to the extreme.

options.t: (D) 依賴應用程式層來維護資料完整性，不使用任何 Spanner 約束。
options.en: (D) Rely on the application layer to maintain data integrity and not use any Spanner constraints.

why.t: Spanner 獨有的「交錯資料表」功能允許將子表 (Child Table) 的資料物理上儲存在父表 (Parent Table) 對應資料列的旁邊 (Co-location)。這極大化了 JOIN 查詢的效率，非常適合庫存系統中「產品-庫存項目」這類緊密耦合的層次結構。
why.en: Spanner's unique "Interleaved Tables" feature allows Child Table data to be physically stored next to the corresponding Parent Table row (Co-location). This maximizes the efficiency of JOIN queries, making it ideal for tightly coupled hierarchical structures like "Product-Inventory Item" in an inventory system.

keywords: AI/ML, Training, Cost Optimization, Spot VM, Checkpointing

question.t: 您正在 GKE 上運行長時間的機器學習訓練工作。
question.en: You are running long-duration machine learning training jobs on GKE.

question.t: 為了節省成本，您希望使用 Spot VMs。但您擔心 Spot VM 被搶占 (Preemption) 會導致訓練進度遺失。
question.en: To save costs, you want to use Spot VMs. But you are worried that Spot VM Preemption will cause loss of training progress.

question.t: 您應該在應用程式中實作什麼機制來解決此問題？
question.en: What mechanism should you implement in your application to address this issue?

options.t: (A) 定期檢查點 (Checkpointing) 並儲存到 Cloud Storage。
options.en: (A) Periodic Checkpointing and saving to Cloud Storage.

options.t: (B) 在收到終止訊號 (SIGTERM) 時，嘗試在 30 秒內完成剩餘訓練。
options.en: (B) Try to complete the remaining training within 30 seconds upon receiving the termination signal (SIGTERM).

options.t: (C) 使用 Live Migration 功能。
(D) 增加 Spot VM 的出價。
options.en: (D) Increase the bid for Spot VMs.

why.t: Spot VM 隨時可能被回收。實作 Checkpointing 允許模型定期將當前狀態（權重）儲存到持久化儲存（如 GCS）。當 VM 被搶占後，新的 Pod 可以從最新的檢查點恢復訓練，而非從頭開始，這是容錯訓練的標準模式。
why.en: Spot VMs can be reclaimed at any time. Implementing Checkpointing allows the model to periodically save its current state (weights) to persistent storage (like GCS). When a VM is preempted, a new Pod can resume training from the latest checkpoint instead of starting over, which is the standard pattern for fault-tolerant training.

keywords: Networking, CDN, Cache Invalidation, Media

question.t: 您的新聞網站使用 Cloud CDN 來快取靜態內容 (圖片、CSS)。
question.en: Your news website uses Cloud CDN to cache static content (images, CSS).

question.t: 當重大新聞發生時，編輯可能會更新首頁圖片。然而，使用者在數小時內仍然看到舊圖片。
question.en: When breaking news happens, editors might update the homepage image. However, users still see the old image for hours.

question.t: 您希望在更新內容後，全球使用者能在幾分鐘內看到變更，同時保持高快取命中率。您應該怎麼做？
question.en: You want global users to see the changes within minutes after updating content, while maintaining a high cache hit ratio. What should you do?

options.t: (A) 對更新的檔案執行快取失效 (Cache Invalidation)。
options.en: (A) Perform Cache Invalidation for the updated files.

options.t: (B) 縮短所有檔案的 TTL (Time-to-Live) 至 5 分鐘。
options.en: (B) Shorten the TTL (Time-to-Live) of all files to 5 minutes.

options.t: (C) 使用版本化的檔案名稱 (Versioning)，例如 `image_v2.jpg`，並更新 HTML 引用。
options.en: (C) Use versioned filenames, e.g., `image_v2.jpg`, and update HTML references.

options.t: (D) 停用 Cloud CDN。

why.t: 雖然快取失效 (A) 可行，但它無法保證即時性（可能需數分鐘）且有頻率限制。最佳實踐是使用版本化 URL (C)。當內容變更時，生成新的檔案名稱。這確保使用者立即取得新內容，而舊內容自然過期，同時不影響其他檔案的長 TTL 快取效益。
why.en: While Cache Invalidation (A) works, it's not guaranteed instant (can take minutes) and has rate limits. The best practice is using versioned URLs (C). When content changes, generate a new filename. This ensures users get new content immediately while old content expires naturally, without impacting the long TTL caching benefits of other files.

keywords: Cloud Run, Concurrency, Performance, Autoscaling

question.t: 您的 Cloud Run 服務處理的是 I/O 密集型請求 (例如等待外部 API 回應)，每個請求需要約 500 毫秒。
question.en: Your Cloud Run service handles I/O intensive requests (e.g., waiting for external API responses), taking about 500ms per request.

question.t: 預設情況下，Cloud Run 每個實例的並行度 (Concurrency) 為 80。您發現實例數量擴充得非常快，導致冷啟動增加且成本上升。
question.en: By default, Cloud Run concurrency per instance is 80. You notice instances scaling out very quickly, leading to increased cold starts and costs.

question.t: 如果您的容器可以輕鬆處理更多並行請求，您應該如何優化？
question.en: If your container can easily handle more concurrent requests, how should you optimize?

options.t: (A) 增加每個實例的最大並行度 (例如設為 1000)。
options.en: (A) Increase the maximum concurrency per instance (e.g., to 1000).

options.t: (B) 增加每個實例的 CPU 和記憶體。
options.en: (B) Increase CPU and memory per instance.

options.t: (C) 減少並行度至 1，以確保隔離。
options.en: (C) Decrease concurrency to 1 to ensure isolation.

options.t: (D) 設定最小實例數 (Min Instances)。

why.t: 對於 I/O 密集型應用，CPU 大部分時間處於閒置等待狀態。增加並行度允許單個實例同時處理更多請求，這能顯著減少所需的實例總數，從而降低成本並減少冷啟動的頻率。
why.en: For I/O intensive apps, the CPU is idle waiting most of the time. Increasing concurrency allows a single instance to handle more simultaneous requests, significantly reducing the total number of instances needed, thereby lowering costs and reducing cold start frequency.

options.en: (C) Create BigQuery instances separately on AWS and Azure.

options.t: (D) 使用 Looker 聯邦查詢。

why.t: BigQuery Omni 允許您在資料所在的雲端 (AWS 或 Azure) 原地執行 BigQuery 分析引擎。查詢運算會移至資料旁執行，只回傳極小的結果集，從而避免了大規模跨雲資料傳輸和相關的 Egress 費用。
why.en: BigQuery Omni allows you to run the BigQuery analytics engine in-place where the data resides (AWS or Azure). Query computation moves to the data, returning only the small result set, thus avoiding large-scale cross-cloud data transfer and associated egress fees.

keywords: Vertex AI, Model Garden, GenAI, Tuning

question.t: 您的行銷團隊希望使用大型語言模型 (LLM) 來自動生成電子郵件行銷文案。
question.en: Your marketing team wants to use Large Language Models (LLMs) to automatically generate email marketing copy.

question.en: They tried the Base Model, but found the generated tone did not align with the company's brand style.

why.en: For scenarios requiring a specific style or tone with a small amount of labeled data (hundreds of records), Supervised Fine-tuning is the best choice. It is much cheaper than pre-training and captures subtle style nuances more consistently than simple Prompt Engineering.

keywords: Security, Cloud Run, Identity, Ingress Control

question.t: 您部署了一個 Cloud Run 服務作為內部微服務，僅供其他 Cloud Run 服務和 VPC 內的 VM 呼叫。
question.en: You deployed a Cloud Run service as an internal microservice, intended to be called only by other Cloud Run services and VMs within the VPC.

question.t: 儘管設定了 IAM 權限，您發現該服務的 URL 仍然可以從網際網路解析並存取 (雖然會收到 403 錯誤)。
question.en: Despite configuring IAM permissions, you find that the service URL can still be resolved and accessed from the internet (albeit receiving a 403 error).

question.t: 您希望在網路層級完全阻擋來自網際網路的連線嘗試。您應該如何設定？
question.en: You want to completely block connection attempts from the internet at the network level. How should you configure it?

options.t: (A) 將 Cloud Run 的「傳入流量 (Ingress)」設定為 `Internal` (或 `Internal and Cloud Load Balancing`)。
options.en: (A) Set Cloud Run "Ingress" to `Internal` (or `Internal and Cloud Load Balancing`).

options.t: (B) 移除 `allUsers` 的 `run.invoker` 角色。
(C) 使用 Cloud Armor 設定 IP 黑名單。
options.en: (C) Use Cloud Armor to configure an IP blocklist.

options.t: (D) 設定 VPC Service Controls。

why.t: 移除 IAM 角色 (B) 只能控制「驗證後」的存取，服務端點在網路上仍然是可見的。將 Ingress 設定為 `Internal` (A) 則是在網路層級限制流量，只有來自 VPC、其他 Cloud Run 服務或內部負載平衡器的請求才能到達該服務，外部請求會直接連線失敗或超時。
why.en: Removing IAM roles (B) only controls "authenticated" access; the service endpoint remains visible on the network. Setting Ingress to `Internal` (A) restricts traffic at the network level; only requests from the VPC, other Cloud Run services, or internal load balancers can reach the service. External requests will fail to connect or timeout directly.

keywords: Storage, Hybrid Cloud, Cloud Storage FUSE, Caching

question.en: Your media production team works in a local office and needs fast access to a large volume of high-resolution video assets stored in Google Cloud Storage.

why.en: Cloud Storage FUSE allows mounting GCS Buckets as local file systems. Once caching is enabled, frequently accessed files are retained on local disk or memory, providing users with read performance similar to local storage while keeping the cloud as the Single Source of Truth.

keywords: Compute Engine, Placement Policy, Availability, Latency

why.en: Compact Placement Policy instructs Google Cloud to deploy VMs on the same rack or adjacent racks as much as possible to minimize network hops and latency between nodes. This is suitable for HPC or tightly coupled database workloads.

keywords: Security, Secret Manager, Cloud Functions, IAM, Least Privilege

question.t: 您的 Cloud Functions 需要存取兩個不同的第三方 API 金鑰：`Key-A` 和 `Key-B`。
question.en: Your Cloud Functions need to access two different third-party API keys: `Key-A` and `Key-B`.

question.t: 這兩個金鑰都儲存在 Secret Manager 中。出於安全考量，您希望函式 `Func-A` 只能存取 `Key-A`，而 `Func-B` 只能存取 `Key-B`。
question.en: Both keys are stored in Secret Manager. For security reasons, you want function `Func-A` to access only `Key-A`, and `Func-B` to access only `Key-B`.

question.t: 您應該如何設定 IAM 權限？
question.en: How should you configure IAM permissions?

options.t: (A) 為 `Func-A` 和 `Func-B` 建立不同的服務帳號，並在 Secret Manager 的個別 Secret 層級 (Secret-level) 分別授予 `Secret Accessor` 角色。
options.en: (A) Create separate Service Accounts for `Func-A` and `Func-B`, and grant the `Secret Accessor` role at the individual Secret level in Secret Manager.

options.t: (B) 為兩個函式使用相同的預設服務帳號，並在專案層級授予 `Secret Accessor` 角色。
options.en: (B) Use the same default Service Account for both functions and grant the `Secret Accessor` role at the Project level.

options.t: (C) 使用 IAM Conditions 根據函式名稱限制存取。
options.en: (C) Use IAM Conditions to restrict access based on function name.

options.t: (D) 將 API 金鑰寫入函式的環境變數中，不使用 Secret Manager。
options.en: (D) Put API keys into the function's environment variables without using Secret Manager.

why.t: 為了遵循最小權限原則 (Least Privilege)，不應在專案層級授予寬鬆的存取權。正確做法是為每個工作負載建立專屬身分 (Service Account)，並在資源層級 (即特定的 Secret) 授予權限，確保每個函式只能存取其所需的特定金鑰。
why.en: To adhere to the principle of Least Privilege, broad access should not be granted at the project level. The correct approach is to create a dedicated identity (Service Account) for each workload and grant permissions at the resource level (i.e., specific Secrets), ensuring each function can only access the specific keys it needs.

why.en: Analytics Hub is a data exchange platform based on BigQuery. It allows organizations to create "Exchanges" and publish datasets for internal or external users to subscribe to. This enables secure Zero-copy data sharing and provides governance and auditing capabilities.

keywords: Networking, Cloud DNS, Private Zone, Split-horizon

why.en: Cloud DNS allows you to create both a Public Zone and a Private Zone for the same domain name. VMs within the VPC will prioritize the attached Private Zone for resolution (Split-horizon), while clients on the internet will query the Public Zone.

question.en: Using `mysqldump` export/import would result in hours of downtime. Which migration strategy should you adopt?

options.t: (A) 使用 Database Migration Service (DMS) 設定持續複寫 (Continuous Replication)。

options.t: (B) 使用 Cloud Storage Transfer Service。

why.en: DMS leverages MySQL's native replication features (binlog replication). It performs an initial snapshot and then continuously syncs changes. During cutover, you only need to pause writes and wait for replication to catch up, allowing the switch to happen in a very short time (usually minutes), meeting the low downtime requirement.

keywords: Deployment, GKE, Helm, Config Connector

(C) Helm。

why.t: Config Connector 是一個 Kubernetes 擴充功能 (CRD)，它允許您使用 Kubernetes 風格的資源定義 (YAML) 來管理 Google Cloud 資源。當您套用 YAML 時，Config Connector 控制器會自動呼叫 Google Cloud API 來建立或更新對應的資源。
why.en: Config Connector is a Kubernetes extension (CRD) that allows you to manage Google Cloud resources using Kubernetes-style resource definitions (YAML). When you apply the YAML, the Config Connector controller automatically calls Google Cloud APIs to create or update the corresponding resources.

keywords: Data Governance, Data Catalog, Tag Templates, PII

question.t: 您的組織擁有數千個 BigQuery 資料集，資料治理團隊需要能夠快速識別哪些欄位包含「高敏感度」資料。
question.en: Your organization has thousands of BigQuery datasets, and the data governance team needs to quickly identify which columns contain "High Sensitivity" data.

question.t: 您需要建立一個標準化的分類系統，並強制資料擁有者為其資料集套用這些標籤。
question.en: You need to create a standardized classification system and mandate data owners to apply these tags to their datasets.

question.t: 您應該使用哪項服務及其功能？
question.en: Which service and feature should you use?

options.t: (A) Data Catalog 標籤範本 (Tag Templates)。
(B) BigQuery Labels。
(C) Dataplex Data Quality 規則。
(D) Cloud DLP 掃描觸發器。

why.t: Data Catalog (現為 Dataplex 的一部分) 專門用於資料發現與治理。標籤範本 (Tag Templates) 允許您定義豐富的中繼資料架構 (如：敏感度等級、資料擁有者、保留期限)，並將其附加到 BigQuery 資料表或欄位上，這比簡單的鍵值對標籤 (Labels) 更適合複雜的治理需求。
why.en: Data Catalog (now part of Dataplex) is designed for data discovery and governance. Tag Templates allow you to define rich metadata schemas (e.g., sensitivity level, data owner, retention period) and attach them to BigQuery tables or columns, which is more suitable for complex governance needs than simple key-value Labels.

keywords: Networking, Cloud DNS, DNS Peering, Hybrid

question.t: 您的 Hub-and-Spoke 網路架構中，只有 Hub VPC 透過 Cloud VPN 連接到本地資料中心。
question.en: In your Hub-and-Spoke network architecture, only the Hub VPC is connected to the on-premises data center via Cloud VPN.

question.t: Spoke VPC 中的應用程式需要解析本地主機名稱 (如 `db.onprem.local`)。
question.en: Applications in Spoke VPCs need to resolve on-premises hostnames (e.g., `db.onprem.local`).

question.t: 您已經在 Hub VPC 中設定了 DNS 轉發區域 (Forwarding Zone) 指向本地 DNS 伺服器。Spoke VPC 應該如何利用此設定？
question.en: You have already configured a DNS Forwarding Zone in the Hub VPC pointing to the on-premises DNS servers. How should Spoke VPCs leverage this configuration?

options.t: (A) 在每個 Spoke VPC 中設定 DNS 對等互連 (DNS Peering)，目標指向 Hub VPC。
options.en: (A) Configure DNS Peering in each Spoke VPC, targeting the Hub VPC.

options.t: (B) 在每個 Spoke VPC 中重複建立相同的轉發區域。
options.en: (B) Recreate the same Forwarding Zone in each Spoke VPC.

options.t: (C) 在 Spoke VPC 中設定私有 Google 存取權 (Private Google Access)。
options.en: (C) Configure Private Google Access in Spoke VPCs.

options.t: (D) 使用 Shared VPC 將所有專案放入同一個網路。
options.en: (D) Use Shared VPC to put all projects in the same network.

why.t: DNS Peering 允許一個 VPC (消費者/Spoke) 將 DNS 查詢發送到另一個 VPC (生產者/Hub)。透過將 Spoke VPC 與 Hub VPC 進行 DNS Peering，Spoke VPC 可以「借用」Hub VPC 的 DNS 設定 (包括轉發區域)，從而成功解析本地網域，且無需在每個 Spoke 重複配置 VPN 或轉發規則。
why.en: DNS Peering allows one VPC (consumer/Spoke) to send DNS queries to another VPC (producer/Hub). By peering Spoke VPCs with the Hub VPC, they can "borrow" the Hub's DNS configuration (including forwarding zones) to successfully resolve on-premises domains without duplicating VPN or forwarding rules in every Spoke.

keywords: Compute Engine, High Availability, Instance Group, Stateful

question.t: 您正在將一個有狀態 (Stateful) 的應用程式遷移到 Compute Engine。
question.en: You are migrating a stateful application to Compute Engine.

question.t: 該應用程式由 3 個節點組成，每個節點都有獨特的名稱 (如 node-0, node-1) 且必須保留其附加的 Persistent Disk 上的資料，即使在重新啟動或自動修復後也是如此。
question.en: The application consists of 3 nodes, each with a unique name (e.g., node-0, node-1) and must retain data on its attached Persistent Disk, even after restart or auto-healing.

question.t: 您應該使用哪種 Compute Engine 功能？
question.en: Which Compute Engine feature should you use?

options.t: (A) 帶有狀態設定 (Stateful Configuration) 的託管執行個體群組 (MIG)。
options.en: (A) Managed Instance Group (MIG) with Stateful Configuration.

options.t: (B) 非託管執行個體群組 (Unmanaged Instance Group)。
(C) 建立三個獨立的 VM，不使用群組。
options.en: (C) Create three standalone VMs without using a group.

options.t: (D) 使用 Google Kubernetes Engine StatefulSet。

why.t: Stateful MIG 允許您為群組中的每個實例定義特定的狀態保留策略。您可以指定磁碟在實例重建時不被刪除 (Reattach)，並為每個實例保留固定的名稱和 metadata。這結合了 MIG 的自動化管理 (如 Auto-healing) 與有狀態工作負載的需求。
why.en: Stateful MIGs allow you to define specific state preservation policies for each instance in the group. You can specify that disks should not be deleted (Reattach) upon instance recreation and preserve fixed names and metadata for each instance. This combines the automated management of MIGs (like Auto-healing) with the needs of stateful workloads.

keywords: Case Study, Cymbal Retail, IoT, Pub/Sub, Dataflow

question.t: 參考 Cymbal Retail 個案研究。Cymbal Retail 計畫在實體店面部署智慧貨架感測器，即時追蹤庫存。
question.en: Refer to the Cymbal Retail case study. Cymbal Retail plans to deploy smart shelf sensors in physical stores to track inventory in real-time.

question.t: 數百萬個感測器會產生海量的小型訊息。您需要一個能夠處理突發流量並保證「至少一次 (At-least-once)」傳遞的接收系統。
question.en: Millions of sensors will generate massive amounts of small messages. You need an ingestion system capable of handling bursty traffic and guaranteeing "At-least-once" delivery.

question.t: 此外，後端系統可能會在維護期間暫時無法使用，您需要緩衝這些訊息。
question.en: Additionally, backend systems might be temporarily unavailable during maintenance, so you need to buffer these messages.

question.t: 您應該選擇哪種解決方案？
question.en: Which solution should you choose?

options.t: (A) Pub/Sub。
(B) Cloud IoT Core (註: 已棄用，但在某些舊題庫可能出現，需注意替代方案)。
options.en: (B) Cloud IoT Core (Note: Deprecated, but might appear in old banks, watch for alternatives).

options.t: (C) gRPC 直接連線到 GKE。
(D) Cloud Storage。

why.t: Pub/Sub 是全託管的訊息中介軟體，專為大規模數據接收設計。它自動擴充以處理突發流量，並提供訊息持久化儲存 (緩衝區)，即使訂閱者 (後端) 離線，訊息也會保留直到被確認 (Ack) 或過期，完全符合「至少一次」傳遞和緩衝需求。
why.en: Pub/Sub is a fully managed messaging middleware designed for large-scale data ingestion. It autoscales to handle bursty traffic and provides persistent message storage (buffering); even if subscribers (backends) are offline, messages are retained until acknowledged (Ack) or expired, perfectly meeting "at-least-once" delivery and buffering requirements.

keywords: Security, Compliance, CMEK, Key Rotation

question.t: 您的安全政策要求所有儲存在 Cloud Storage 中的資料必須使用客戶管理的加密金鑰 (CMEK) 進行加密。
question.en: Your security policy requires that all data stored in Cloud Storage must be encrypted using Customer-Managed Encryption Keys (CMEK).

question.t: 此外，這些金鑰必須每 90 天自動輪替 (Rotate) 一次。舊資料無需使用新金鑰重新加密 (Rewrap)，但新寫入的資料必須使用新金鑰。
question.en: Additionally, these keys must be automatically rotated every 90 days. Old data does not need to be re-encrypted (rewrapped) with the new key, but newly written data must use the new key.

question.t: 您應該如何設定 Cloud KMS 金鑰？
question.en: How should you configure the Cloud KMS key?

options.t: (A) 設定金鑰的輪替週期 (Rotation Period) 為 90 天。
options.en: (A) Set the key's Rotation Period to 90 days.

options.t: (B) 每 90 天手動建立新金鑰版本，並更新 Bucket 的預設金鑰設定。
options.en: (B) Manually create a new key version every 90 days and update the Bucket's default key setting.

options.t: (C) 使用 Cloud Functions 定期呼叫 API 進行輪替。
options.en: (C) Use Cloud Functions to periodically call the API for rotation.

options.t: (D) 這是不可能的，Cloud Storage 只支援 Google 管理的金鑰自動輪替。
options.en: (D) This is impossible; Cloud Storage only supports automatic rotation for Google-managed keys.

why.t: Cloud KMS 支援自動輪替。只需在金鑰上設定輪替週期 (A)，KMS 就會自動產生新的主要版本 (Primary Version)。Cloud Storage 會自動使用該金鑰的最新主要版本來加密新物件。舊物件仍可使用舊版本金鑰解密，無需人工介入。
why.en: Cloud KMS supports automatic rotation. Simply setting the Rotation Period (A) on the key causes KMS to automatically generate a new Primary Version. Cloud Storage will automatically use the latest primary version of that key to encrypt new objects. Old objects can still be decrypted using the old key versions without manual intervention.

keywords: Cost Optimization, GKE, HPA, Scaling

question.t: 您的 GKE 叢集上運行著一個 Web 應用程式，使用 Horizontal Pod Autoscaler (HPA) 根據 CPU 使用率進行擴充。
question.en: You are running a web application on a GKE cluster, using Horizontal Pod Autoscaler (HPA) to scale based on CPU usage.

question.t: 您發現當流量突然激增時，HPA 需要幾分鐘才能反應過來，導致部分請求超時。
question.en: You notice that when traffic spikes suddenly, HPA takes a few minutes to react, causing some request timeouts.

question.t: 為了改善反應速度並避免過度擴充，您應該考慮改用哪種擴充指標？
question.en: To improve response speed and avoid over-scaling, which scaling metric should you consider switching to?

options.t: (A) 自訂指標 (Custom Metrics)，例如每秒請求數 (RPS) 或隊列長度。
options.en: (A) Custom Metrics, such as Requests Per Second (RPS) or queue length.

options.t: (B) 記憶體使用率。
(C) 節點的 CPU 使用率。
(D) 固定副本數 (Fixed Replicas)。

why.t: CPU 使用率是一個落後指標 (Lagging Indicator)，通常在流量進來一段時間後才會升高。RPS (每秒請求數) 是一個領先指標 (Leading Indicator)，能更即時地反映負載變化。使用 Cloud Monitoring Adapter 將 RPS 作為自訂指標提供給 HPA，可以實現更靈敏且精確的擴充。
why.en: CPU usage is a Lagging Indicator, usually rising only some time after traffic arrives. RPS (Requests Per Second) is a Leading Indicator, reflecting load changes more immediately. Using Cloud Monitoring Adapter to expose RPS as a custom metric to HPA enables more responsive and accurate scaling.

keywords: Case Study, KnightMotives, CI/CD, Container Analysis, Security

question.t: 參考 KnightMotives Automotive 個案研究。為了確保車載軟體的安全性，您需要在 CI/CD 管道中自動偵測容器映像檔中的漏洞。
question.en: Refer to the KnightMotives Automotive case study. To ensure vehicle software security, you need to automatically detect vulnerabilities in container images within the CI/CD pipeline.

question.t: 如果發現嚴重等級 (Critical) 的漏洞，必須立即阻擋部署。
question.en: If vulnerabilities of Critical severity are found, deployment must be blocked immediately.

question.t: 您應該結合哪兩項服務來實現此控制？(請選擇兩項)
question.en: Which two services should you combine to implement this control? (Choose two)

options.t: (A) Artifact Registry Vulnerability Scanning。
(B) Binary Authorization。
(C) Cloud Armor。
(D) Cloud Audit Logs。
(E) Identity-Aware Proxy。

why.t: Artifact Registry 漏洞掃描 (A) 會在映像檔上傳時自動分析其依賴項和 OS 套件，找出已知漏洞。Binary Authorization (B) 則作為部署時的守門員 (Gatekeeper)，可以設定政策：如果映像檔的漏洞掃描結果未通過（例如包含 Critical 漏洞），則拒絕該映像檔在 GKE 上啟動。
why.en: Artifact Registry Vulnerability Scanning (A) automatically analyzes dependencies and OS packages for known vulnerabilities when images are pushed. Binary Authorization (B) acts as a deploy-time Gatekeeper, allowing you to set policies: if an image fails vulnerability scanning (e.g., contains Critical vulnerabilities), it is denied from starting on GKE.

keywords: Storage, Archive, Cost, Retrieval

question.t: 您的公司需要備份 10 PB 的歷史財務數據以符合 7 年的法規保留要求。
question.en: Your company needs to backup 10 PB of historical financial data to meet a 7-year regulatory retention requirement.

question.t: 這些數據預計每年只會被存取一次以進行稽核。您希望將儲存成本降至最低。
question.en: This data is expected to be accessed only once a year for auditing. You want to minimize storage costs.

question.t: 您應該選擇哪種 Cloud Storage 類別？
question.en: Which Cloud Storage class should you choose?

options.t: (A) Archive Storage。
(B) Coldline Storage。
(C) Nearline Storage。
(D) Standard Storage。

why.t: Archive Storage 提供最低的每月儲存費用，專為存取頻率低於每年一次的長期備份設計。雖然它的資料取回費用 (Retrieval Fee) 最高，但對於「每年一次」的存取頻率，其節省的巨額儲存費用遠大於取回成本，總體 TCO 最低。
why.en: Archive Storage offers the lowest monthly storage cost, designed for long-term backups accessed less than once a year. While it has the highest retrieval fee, for an access frequency of "once a year," the massive savings in storage costs far outweigh the retrieval costs, resulting in the lowest overall TCO.

keywords: Compute Engine, Licensing, BYOL, Windows

question.t: 您希望將現有的 Windows Server 工作負載遷移到 Google Cloud，並且希望利用現有的微軟軟體授權 (BYOL) 以節省成本。
question.en: You want to migrate existing Windows Server workloads to Google Cloud and want to leverage existing Microsoft software licenses (BYOL) to save costs.

question.t: 您應該在 Compute Engine 上使用哪種節點類型？
question.en: Which node type should you use on Compute Engine?

options.t: (A) 單一租戶節點 (Sole-tenant Nodes)。
(B) 先佔節點 (Preemptible Nodes)。
(C) 多租戶共享核心 (Shared-core) 機器。
(D) 機密虛擬機器 (Confidential VMs)。

why.t: 微軟的授權條款通常要求軟體必須綁定到專用的實體硬體。單一租戶節點 (Sole-tenant Nodes) 提供了專屬的實體伺服器，使您能夠滿足 BYOL 的合規要求，同時避免重複購買授權。
why.en: Microsoft licensing terms often require software to be bound to dedicated physical hardware. Sole-tenant Nodes provide dedicated physical servers, allowing you to meet BYOL compliance requirements while avoiding repurchasing licenses.

keywords: GKE, Networking, VPC-native, IP Aliasing

question.t: 您正在規劃一個新的 GKE 叢集，預計將會有大量的 Pod (超過 5000 個)。
question.en: You are planning a new GKE cluster, expecting a large number of Pods (over 5000).

question.t: 您希望 Pod IP 是 VPC 網路中的一等公民 (First-class Citizen)，可以直接與其他 VPC 資源通訊，而無需經過 NAT。
question.en: You want Pod IPs to be First-class Citizens in the VPC network, able to communicate directly with other VPC resources without NAT.

question.t: 此外，您希望避免手動管理路由表。
question.en: Additionally, you want to avoid manually managing route tables.

question.t: 您應該選擇哪種 GKE 網路模式？
question.en: Which GKE network mode should you choose?

options.t: (A) VPC 原生叢集 (VPC-native Cluster) 使用 IP 別名 (IP Aliasing)。
(B) 基於路由的叢集 (Routes-based Cluster)。
(C) 私有叢集 (Private Cluster)。
(D) 使用 Cloud NAT。

why.t: VPC-native 叢集利用 VPC 的次要 IP 範圍 (Secondary IP Ranges) 為 Pod 分配 IP。這使得 Pod IP 成為 VPC 網路的一部分，無需額外的路由規則即可直接通訊，且具有更好的擴展性和效能。Routes-based 叢集依賴路由表，在大規模叢集中會受到路由配額限制。
why.en: VPC-native clusters use Secondary IP Ranges of the VPC to assign IPs to Pods. This makes Pod IPs part of the VPC network, allowing direct communication without extra route rules, and offering better scalability and performance. Routes-based clusters rely on route tables, which hit quota limits in large clusters.

keywords: Security, DDoS, Cloud Armor, Rate Limiting

question.t: 您的網站遭遇了應用層 (L7) DDoS 攻擊，攻擊者透過大量的 HTTP 請求耗盡了後端資源。
question.en: Your website is under a Layer 7 (L7) DDoS attack, where attackers are exhausting backend resources with a flood of HTTP requests.

question.t: 您分析日誌後發現，攻擊流量來自數千個不同的 IP，但它們都具有相同的特定 User-Agent 標頭。
question.en: After analyzing logs, you found the attack traffic comes from thousands of different IPs, but they all share a specific User-Agent header.

question.t: 您應該如何在 Cloud Armor 中設定規則以最精確地阻擋此攻擊？
question.en: How should you configure Cloud Armor rules to block this attack most precisely?

options.t: (A) 建立一個基於標頭 (Header-based) 的規則，拒絕匹配該 User-Agent 的請求。
options.en: (A) Create a Header-based rule to deny requests matching that User-Agent.

options.t: (B) 啟用自適應保護 (Adaptive Protection)。
(C) 設定基於 IP 的速率限制 (Rate Limiting)。
(D) 封鎖所有來自該地區的流量。
options.en: (D) Block all traffic from that region.

why.t: 雖然 Adaptive Protection (B) 可以自動學習，但在已知攻擊特徵 (特定的 User-Agent) 的情況下，手動建立一個精確匹配該標頭的拒絕規則 (A) 是最快且誤報率最低的緩解措施。IP 速率限制 (C) 可能無法有效阻擋分散式攻擊 (每個 IP 請求數可能不高)。
why.en: While Adaptive Protection (B) learns automatically, given a known attack signature (specific User-Agent), manually creating a deny rule that precisely matches that header (A) is the fastest mitigation with the lowest false positive rate. IP Rate Limiting (C) might not effectively block distributed attacks (requests per IP might be low).

keywords: Compute Engine, Availability, Snapshot, Regional Persistent Disk

question.t: 您的資料庫運行在單一區域 (Zone) 的 Compute Engine VM 上，使用 Persistent Disk (PD) 儲存資料。
question.en: Your database runs on a Compute Engine VM in a single zone, using Persistent Disk (PD) for storage.

question.t: 您希望將復原點目標 (RPO) 降至接近零，以應對區域性 (Zonal) 故障。
question.en: You want to reduce the Recovery Point Objective (RPO) to near zero to handle Zonal failures.

question.t: 您應該將儲存層遷移到哪種解決方案？
question.en: Which solution should you migrate the storage layer to?

options.t: (A) 區域性永久磁碟 (Regional Persistent Disk)。
(B) 每小時執行的磁碟快照 (Disk Snapshots)。
(C) Local SSD 搭配應用程式層級複寫。
(D) Cloud Storage Nearline。

why.t: Regional Persistent Disk 會同步將資料複寫到同一個地區內的兩個區域 (Zones)。如果主要區域發生故障，您可以立即強制將磁碟掛載到另一個區域的 VM 上，幾乎沒有資料遺失 (RPO~0)，這比每小時快照 (RPO=1小時) 好得多。
why.en: Regional Persistent Disk synchronously replicates data to two zones within the same region. If the primary zone fails, you can immediately force-attach the disk to a VM in the other zone with almost no data loss (RPO~0), which is far better than hourly snapshots (RPO=1 hour).

keywords: Data Processing, Dataflow, Template, Flex Templates

question.t: 您的開發團隊已經編寫了一個 Apache Beam 管道來處理銷售數據。
question.en: Your development team has written an Apache Beam pipeline to process sales data.

question.t: 非技術人員 (如業務分析師) 需要能夠隨時執行此管道，但他們不懂如何使用 SDK 或命令行。
question.en: Non-technical staff (e.g., business analysts) need to be able to run this pipeline anytime, but they don't know how to use the SDK or command line.

question.t: 您希望讓他們能透過 Cloud Console 或簡單的 API 呼叫來啟動作業，並能自訂輸入參數 (如日期)。
question.en: You want to allow them to launch jobs via Cloud Console or simple API calls, with customizable input parameters (e.g., date).

question.t: 您應該使用哪項 Dataflow 功能？
question.en: Which Dataflow feature should you use?

options.t: (A) Dataflow Flex Templates。
(B) Dataflow SQL。
(C) Cloud Functions 觸發器。
(D) Dataproc Workflow Templates。

why.t: Flex Templates 允許您將 Beam 管道打包成 Docker 映像檔並儲存在 Registry 中。這將管道的「建置」與「執行」解耦，讓非技術使用者可以透過 Console UI 或 API 輕鬆啟動作業並傳遞參數，而無需安裝開發環境。
why.en: Flex Templates allow you to package Beam pipelines as Docker images stored in a Registry. This decouples pipeline "build" from "execution," enabling non-technical users to easily launch jobs and pass parameters via Console UI or API without installing a development environment.

keywords: Case Study, Cymbal Retail, Cloud Spanner, Stale Read, Performance

question.t: 參考 Cymbal Retail 個案研究。Cymbal Retail 的庫存儀表板需要每分鐘重新整理一次，顯示各區域的庫存總量。
question.en: Refer to the Cymbal Retail case study. Cymbal Retail's inventory dashboard needs to refresh every minute, showing total inventory across regions.

question.t: 此查詢涉及跨多個地區的大規模聚合 (Aggregation)。如果使用強一致性讀取 (Strong Read)，會導致延遲過高並影響交易效能。
question.en: This query involves large-scale aggregation across multiple regions. Using Strong Read would result in high latency and impact transaction performance.

question.t: 業務部門可以接受數據有最多 15 秒的延遲。您應該如何優化查詢？
question.en: The business can accept data staleness of up to 15 seconds. How should you optimize the query?

options.t: (A) 使用精確過期讀取 (Exact Staleness Read)，設定時間戳記為 `now() - 15s`。
options.en: (A) Use Exact Staleness Read, setting the timestamp to `now() - 15s`.

options.t: (B) 增加 Spanner 節點數量。
options.en: (B) Increase the number of Spanner nodes.

options.t: (C) 使用 Dataflow 預先計算並寫入 BigTable。
options.en: (C) Use Dataflow to pre-calculate and write to BigTable.

options.t: (D) 使用唯讀複本 (Read-only Replica)。

why.t: Spanner 的 Stale Read (過期讀取) 允許讀取過去某個時間點的快照。透過讀取 15 秒前的資料，Spanner 可以從本地副本 (Local Replica) 就近提供服務，無需跨區域協商一致性，這能大幅降低延遲並節省運算資源，且完全符合業務對資料新鮮度的要求。
why.en: Spanner's Stale Read allows reading a snapshot from a past point in time. By reading data from 15 seconds ago, Spanner can serve from a local replica without cross-region consensus, significantly reducing latency and saving compute resources, while fully meeting business requirements for data freshness.

keywords: Compliance, Logging, Access Transparency, Google Support

question.t: 您的公司對資料隱私有極高的要求。除了標準的稽核日誌外，您還需要知道 Google 支援人員何時以及為何存取了您的資料。

why.en: Access Transparency provides near real-time logs recording accesses by Google staff when performing support or engineering maintenance on your content. This complements Cloud Audit Logs (which record your own accesses), providing complete visibility.

keywords: Networking, Load Balancing, Global, Backend Service

question.t: 您使用全球外部應用程式負載平衡器 (Global External Application Load Balancer) 來分發流量到位於歐洲和美洲的後端。
question.en: You use a Global External Application Load Balancer to distribute traffic to backends in Europe and the Americas.

question.t: 您希望將來自亞洲使用者的流量導向一個位於亞洲的靜態 S3 Bucket (作為備援)，而不是導向歐美的後端。
question.en: You want to route traffic from Asian users to a static S3 Bucket in Asia (as a backup) instead of routing to backends in Europe or the Americas.

question.t: 您應該使用哪種後端類型？
question.en: Which backend type should you use?

options.t: (A) 外部後端 (External Backend, Internet NEG)。

wg.t: 網際網路網路端點群組

options.t: (B) 後端儲存空間 (Backend Bucket)。

why.en: Internet NEG allows you to point a Google Cloud Load Balancer backend to any internet-accessible endpoint (like AWS S3, On-premise URL). This enables you to leverage Google's global edge network to optimize routing to external services.

keywords: Compute Engine, Automation, Image Management, Packer

why.en: Cloud Build is Google Cloud's serverless CI/CD platform. It natively supports Packer builders, allowing fast VM image building on Google's infrastructure and storing the resulting Artifacts. This solves local build performance and security issues and is easy to automate.

keywords: Case Study, KnightMotives, Networking, Security, VPC Peering

question.t: 參考 KnightMotives Automotive 個案研究。KnightMotives 併購了一家小型新創公司，該公司也在 Google Cloud 上運行。
question.en: Refer to the KnightMotives Automotive case study. KnightMotives has acquired a small startup that also runs on Google Cloud.

question.en: You need to connect the startup's VPC to KnightMotives' main VPC.

question.en: However, their CIDR ranges overlap, preventing direct VPC Peering.

question.t: 您希望避免重新編址 (Re-IP) 帶來的巨大工作量。您應該使用哪種解決方案？
question.en: You want to avoid the huge effort of Re-IPing. Which solution should you use?

options.t: (A) 使用 Private Service Connect (PSC) 發布特定服務。
options.en: (A) Use Private Service Connect (PSC) to publish specific services.

options.t: (B) 使用 Cloud VPN 並設定 NAT (Network Address Translation)。
options.en: (B) Use Cloud VPN and configure NAT (Network Address Translation).

options.t: (C) 使用 Cloud NAT。
(D) 將所有 VM 遷移到新的子網域。
options.en: (D) Migrate all VMs to new subnets.

why.t: Private Service Connect (PSC) 允許您將服務以「生產者-消費者」模式發布。消費者透過一個專用的端點 IP 存取服務，而不需要兩個 VPC 的網段互通。這完美解決了 IP 重疊問題，且比配置複雜的 VPN NAT 更簡單、效能更好。
why.en: Private Service Connect (PSC) allows you to publish services in a "Producer-Consumer" model. Consumers access the service via a dedicated endpoint IP without requiring the two VPC subnets to be routed to each other. This perfectly solves the IP overlap issue and is simpler and higher performance than configuring complex VPN NAT.

keywords: Cost Optimization, Storage, BigQuery, Active Storage

question.t: 您的 BigQuery 帳單顯示「Active Storage」費用異常高。
question.en: Your BigQuery bill shows abnormally high "Active Storage" costs.

question.t: 經調查，發現許多資料表在過去 90 天內未被修改，但仍被計為 Active Storage。
question.en: Upon investigation, many tables haven't been modified in the last 90 days but are still charged as Active Storage.

question.t: BigQuery 的長期儲存 (Long-term Storage) 機制應該會自動降低這些費用 (半價)。為什麼沒有生效？
question.en: BigQuery's Long-term Storage mechanism should automatically reduce these costs (half price). Why isn't it working?

options.t: (A) 因為資料表的分區 (Partition) 曾被修改過。
options.en: (A) Because the table partitions were modified.

options.t: (B) 因為有人查詢 (Query) 了這些資料表。
(C) 因為您使用的是 Flat-rate 計費模式。
options.en: (C) Because you are using Flat-rate billing.

options.t: (D) 因為資料表啟用了串流緩衝區 (Streaming Buffer)。
options.en: (D) Because the table has Streaming Buffer enabled.

why.t: BigQuery 的長期儲存計費是基於「最後修改時間」。對於分區表，每個分區是獨立計時的。如果某個分區被修改（例如重新載入資料或 DML 更新），該分區的計時器會重置為 Active。**查詢 (Reading)** 並不會重置計時器。因此，最可能的原因是維護作業修改了分區。
why.en: BigQuery's Long-term Storage billing is based on "last modification time". For partitioned tables, each partition is timed independently. If a partition is modified (e.g., data reload or DML update), its timer resets to Active. **Querying (Reading)** does not reset the timer. Therefore, the most likely reason is that maintenance operations modified the partitions.

keywords: Data Analytics, Pub/Sub, Dataflow, BigQuery, Streaming

question.t: 您的公司需要建立一個即時儀表板來監控網站流量。
question.en: Your company needs to build a real-time dashboard to monitor website traffic.

question.t: 網站日誌透過 Pub/Sub 串流傳送。您需要對這些日誌進行過濾、轉換和聚合（例如每分鐘計算一次 PV），然後將結果寫入 BigQuery。
question.en: Website logs are streamed via Pub/Sub. You need to filter, transform, and aggregate these logs (e.g., calculate PV every minute) and then write the results to BigQuery.

question.t: 您應該使用哪項服務來執行這些資料處理任務？

(B) Cloud Functions。
(C) Dataproc。
(D) BigQuery 本身的串流寫入。

why.t: Dataflow 是處理大規模串流資料的最佳選擇，特別是涉及「時間視窗 (Windowing)」聚合（如每分鐘 PV）的場景。它提供精確一次 (Exactly-once) 處理語義，並能自動處理延遲資料 (Late Data)。Cloud Functions 不適合長時間運行的視窗聚合。
why.en: Dataflow is the best choice for processing large-scale streaming data, especially scenarios involving "Windowing" aggregation (e.g., PV per minute). It provides Exactly-once processing semantics and automatically handles Late Data. Cloud Functions is not suitable for long-running windowed aggregations.

keywords: Security, IAM, Policy, Hierarchy

question.t: 您是組織管理員，希望確保沒有人（包括專案擁有者）可以在特定資料夾下的任何專案中建立公開的 Cloud Storage Bucket。
question.en: You are an Organization Administrator and want to ensure that no one (including Project Owners) can create public Cloud Storage Buckets in any project under a specific folder.

question.t: 您已經設定了 IAM 政策，但專案擁有者可以修改 IAM。您應該使用什麼機制來強制執行此限制？
question.en: You have configured IAM policies, but Project Owners can modify IAM. What mechanism should you use to enforce this restriction?

options.t: (A) 組織政策 (Organization Policy)。

why.t: 組織政策是一種凌駕於 IAM 之上的資源限制機制。透過設定 `storage.publicAccessPrevention` 約束，即使使用者擁有修改 IAM 的權限，也無法將 Bucket 設為公開，因為這是平台層級的強制控制。

keywords: Networking, Load Balancing, Internal, Private Access

question.en: You have a multi-tier application with the frontend in a public subnet and the backend API in a private subnet.

question.en: You want to provide load balancing for the backend API, but traffic should not leave the VPC network and should not use external IPs.

question.t: 您應該選擇哪種負載平衡器？

why.en: The Internal Application Load Balancer (L7) is designed for HTTP(S) traffic within a VPC. It uses internal IP addresses, ensuring traffic remains on Google's private network, making it ideal for inter-microservice communication.

keywords: Compute Engine, Cost Optimization, Preemptible, Spot VM

why.en: Spot VMs (formerly Preemptible VMs) offer discounts of up to 91%, with the trade-off that Google can reclaim these instances at any time. For fault-tolerant batch jobs, this is the most cost-effective choice.

keywords: Storage, Compliance, Object Versioning, Retention Policy

question.t: 您的公司需要遵守法規，要求某些財務文件必須保留至少 7 年，且在此期間內不得被刪除或修改 (WORM)。
question.en: Your company needs to comply with regulations requiring certain financial documents to be retained for at least 7 years and cannot be deleted or modified during this period (WORM).

question.t: 您應該如何在 Cloud Storage Bucket 上設定？

options.t: (D) 使用 Archive 儲存類別。

why.t: Cloud Storage 的保留政策允許您指定物件的最短保留期限。一旦政策被「鎖定」，就無法縮短保留期限或刪除政策，即使是專案擁有者也無法刪除受保護的物件，這完全符合 WORM 合規要求。
why.en: Cloud Storage Retention Policy allows you to specify a minimum retention period for objects. Once the policy is "Locked," the retention period cannot be shortened and the policy cannot be deleted; even project owners cannot delete protected objects, fully meeting WORM compliance requirements.

keywords: Case Study, Altostrat Media, Migration, Lift and Shift, VM

question.t: 參考 Altostrat Media 個案研究。Altostrat 希望將其現有的應用程式伺服器從本地資料中心遷移到 Google Cloud。

keywords: Operations, Cloud Logging, Metrics, Alerting

question.t: 您的應用程式會將錯誤訊息寫入 Cloud Logging。您希望在每當出現特定錯誤訊息（例如 "Payment Gateway Timeout"）時收到通知。
question.en: Your application writes error messages to Cloud Logging. You want to be notified whenever a specific error message (e.g., "Payment Gateway Timeout") appears.

question.t: 您應該如何設定？

options.t: (D) 在應用程式代碼中直接發送電子郵件。

keywords: Case Study, EHR Healthcare, GKE, HIPAA, Security

question.t: 參考 EHR Healthcare 個案研究。為了符合 HIPAA 規範，EHR 系統中的所有容器通訊都必須加密。
question.en: Refer to the EHR Healthcare case study. To comply with HIPAA regulations, all container communication within the EHR system must be encrypted.

question.t: 您計畫在 GKE 上使用 Istio (Anthos Service Mesh)。您應該啟用哪項功能來實現 Pod 之間的自動加密？
question.en: You plan to use Istio (Anthos Service Mesh) on GKE. Which feature should you enable to achieve automatic encryption between Pods?

(C) 網路政策 (Network Policies)。
(D) 應用層加密 (Application-layer Encryption)。

why.t: Anthos Service Mesh 的 mTLS 功能會自動為每個服務分配身分憑證，並加密服務網格中所有服務之間的流量。這確保了傳輸中的數據安全 (Encryption in Transit)，且無需修改應用程式代碼。
why.en: Anthos Service Mesh's mTLS feature automatically assigns identity certificates to each service and encrypts traffic between all services in the mesh. This ensures Encryption in Transit without requiring changes to application code.

keywords: AI/ML, Vertex AI, Custom Training, Containers

question.t: 您的資料科學團隊使用 PyTorch 開發了一個客製化模型，並希望在 Vertex AI 上進行訓練。
question.en: Your data science team has developed a custom model using PyTorch and wants to train it on Vertex AI.

question.en: The model depends on some special System Libraries that are not in Vertex AI's pre-built containers.

question.t: 您應該如何打包訓練作業？
question.en: How should you package the training job?

options.t: (D) 將所有依賴項靜態編譯到 Python 二進制文件中。

why.t: 當預建容器無法滿足需求時，Vertex AI 支援使用自訂容器。您可以透過 Dockerfile 定義環境，安裝任何所需的 OS 套件或程式庫，確保訓練環境的一致性和可重現性。
